frontmatter.title: Gatsby Get Current Url Pathname
frontmatter.abstract: I want to make layout title show different font-size based on pages. For example, show a larger font in note list page, but a small button in blog page.

frontmatter.title: Backup and Restore MongoDB
frontmatter.abstract: Since I am developing GCGR website, constantly I will need to modify the databse. So I may need to transfer the data from online to offline constantly.  Here I want to record a bit the commands I use to dump data and recover them.

frontmatter.title: Deploy Gatsby to Github User Page
frontmatter.abstract: After sometime of development, I now finished a basic version of note. So then I want to deploy it on my github, I like the idea that using XXXX.github.io for domain name, which looks even better than using a bought domain. So I need to find out how to do it

frontmatter.title: Download from EGA via Python
frontmatter.abstract: Since I am working on a project related to a EGA data, I need to download them from the website. After learning a bit, I successfully down it. Here I recoded a bit the process.

frontmatter.title: Gatsby-Personal-Website
frontmatter.abstract: Can't remember how many times I re-create my personal website. This time I used Gatsby React, a nice framework to do it.
